attributes.action: We are taking cuts, so should MPs
attributes.additional_details: Millions of people all over the UK are struggling to pay their bills, feed their families and heat their homes and it's only getting worse. Yet many MP's are on a 3 figure salary from OUR taxes and have the cheek to introduce new taxes! The reason we apparently pay MP's so much is to avoid corruption, but this is a corrupt act. Recent news of a planned increase of politicians salaries is practically impudent in these times when poverty and malaise blight our generation. I am calling for MP's in this country to follow the example of Uruguayan President José Mujica, who donates a majority of his salary to charity and cut the amount of money in their own back pockets.
